advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.description:
Apple 的年度应用在全球范围内下载次数超过 1500 万次，获得 20 万个 5 星级评分，Day One 重塑了日记功能，让您可以随时记录日常生活。 在全球最值得信赖的数字日记中安全地保存音频、视频、照片、笔记等内容。

“Day One 创造了一个非常罕见，甚至让人感觉神圣的东西：一个完全私人的数字空间。”-《纽约时报》

“Day One 使写日记变成了一件轻松愉快的事。”- Wired

“这款出色的日记应用程序仍然美观、易于使用，并且对于任何竞争对手来说都是一个难以超越的强大产品。”- Macworld

为什么选择 DAY ONE？

Day One 是一款原创日记应用。经过十年不懈的更新和新增功能，使它成为世界上最私密、最值得信任和最易于使用的日记记录平台。

易于使用，让您爱不释手

• 备受赞誉的美观设计
• 无限的文本日记条目
• 无限量照片和视频*
•功能强大的富文本格式，带有 Markdown 功能
• 不同的日记类型适用于记录您生活的方方面面*

私密且安全

• 自动备份可确保日记条目的安全性
• 端到端加密，这是一种确保日记条目完全私密的巧妙方式
•日记条目使用密码或 TouchID 来保证安全性
•多个导出选项（pdf、纯文本、JSON 等）确保您的日记条目永远属于您

养成习惯并坚持下去

•可编程的提醒通知
• 独特的每日日记提示功能有助于避免日记中断
•可自定义的模板可节省时间，并可向日记条目中添加组织
• 通过今日视图，您可以大致了解您去过哪里，做了什么

随时随地写日记

• 可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用的跨平台应用
• 能够直接向您的日记发送文本或电子邮件条目

专为记录回忆而生

• 那年今日功能让您可以回顾过去的回忆
• 标签、收藏夹和搜索筛选器使您可以轻松找到所需内容
• 地图视图可快速显示您在日记中记录的所有地点

*Day One 可永久免费使用，不限日记条目数量。 Day One 高级会员可享受其他功能，包括不限量的照片、视频和音频录制。 立即开始免费试用。

隐私政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用条款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技术帮助或其他查询，请访问 https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

cn.trackName: TA - 一对一聊天，遇见对的人
cn.description:
《TA》自上线以来，已成功配对了几十万对！他们从最开始的相遇，再慢慢相恋。

很多人找不到对象的真正原因是缺乏认识异性的途径，《TA》正是一条认识异性的好途径。

《TA》会根据年龄、学历、兴趣爱好等维度进行配对，把最合适两人配成一对，再进行一对一聊天。

每个APP都有一个定位，《TA》的定位是【靠谱】。如果你想找到男朋友、女朋友、结婚对象，那欢迎你。

-----联系我们-----
如在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请联系我们：
- 在线帮助：在TA中选择“我” -> “意见反馈”
- 邮件服务：shiyixin0420@163.com（如果是帐号问题，请在邮件中注明出问题的帐号）

-----连续订阅说明-----
- TA提供按月、按季、按年三种周期订阅。
- 费用将在确认购买时通过你的 iTunes 账号收取。
- 根据App Store自动续约规则，会员会在订阅期结束前24小时内自动续约（含免费试用），你可以在会员订阅期结束前至少24小时取消订阅。
- 通过账号设置 - 管理订阅来取消订阅。
- 条款与隐私政策：https://www.bokuigo.cn/misterrightPrivacyPolicy/index.jsp

hk.releaseNotes:
26.6.73.15 
- Improvements to player development 
- Misc Go specific QoL changes 
- Misc bug and crash fixes
- Updated data
hk.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse 

Official MLB & KBO Licenses
· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase
· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters

Create Your Perfect Team
· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world
· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users
· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available
· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team

New This Year
· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more
· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation
· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale
· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation
· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about
· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play.
· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go"
· And more!


OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. 

Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball.

Officially Licensed Product – MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE®

Out of the Park Developments © Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.

- Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3

hk.releaseNotes:
未來更新內容：
「無神論」原型——以及更多！
不要錯過——GameFirst 套裝中的宗教公司，以及我們其他由 GameFirst 開發的遊戲折扣！
感謝您的支持與好評！
hk.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

hk.releaseNotes:
Ecological games, ECO chronicles!
Green days calendar (more details in the app description).

Premium version! 
For feedback: hi@gamefirst.pro
hk.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)

June 5 — World Environment Day

July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

- 去除廣告！

hk.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

mo.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse 

Official MLB & KBO Licenses
· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase
· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters

Create Your Perfect Team
· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world
· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users
· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available
· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team

New This Year
· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more
· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation
· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale
· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation
· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about
· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play.
· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go"
· And more!


OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase.

mo.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

mo.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)
April 22 — Earth Day
May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity
June 5 — World Environment Day
June 8 — World Oceans Day
June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！

mo.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

mo.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

tw.releaseNotes:
未來更新內容：
「無神論」原型——以及更多！
不要錯過——GameFirst 套裝中的宗教公司，以及我們其他由 GameFirst 開發的遊戲折扣！
感謝您的支持與好評！
tw.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

tw.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)
April 22 — Earth Day
May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity
June 5 — World Environment Day
June 8 — World Oceans Day
June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

在期盼已久的 「  Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！

每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 一流遊戲「  Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集

tw.description:
《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？

 - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！

 - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。

- 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。

 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。

 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。

 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。

 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

tw.trackName: 石器狩獵勇士:原始人部落之戰
tw.description:
在這片古老而神秘的原始土地上，你扮演一位勇敢的原始戰士，肩負著保衛部落的重任。城牆之外，兇猛的恐龍和野獸隨時準備攻擊你。拿起你的武器，準備迎接一場驚心動魄的戰鬥吧！
遊戲玩法
遊戲操作簡單，所有玩家都能輕鬆上手。透過在螢幕上左右滑動，你可以控制你的原始戰士在城牆上移動，躲避野獸的攻擊。點擊螢幕，他的武器可以越過城牆射擊，攻擊逼近的敵人。每一次精準的射擊都可能改變戰局，所以要保持警惕，靈活機動，確保每一次攻擊都命中目標。
武器系統
在戰鬥中，擊敗野獸不僅可以降低威脅，還能讓你有機會收集它們掉落的武器。這些武器種類繁多，有些可以增加傷害，有些可以擴大射程，有些甚至帶有冰凍或燃燒等特殊效果。巧妙地使用這些武器，將讓你在戰鬥中佔上風。 Boss 戰與強力武器
成功擊敗一波又一波的野獸後，強大的 Boss 便會出現。這些 Boss 體型巨大，攻擊力驚人，擊敗它們後您將獲得強力武器作為獎勵。這些武器不僅威力強大，還可能擁有獨特的技能，使後續戰鬥更有效率。

生命值恢復與怪物屠殺

在戰鬥中，擊殺一定數量的怪物後，您的生命值將自動恢復。這意味著即使您在激烈的戰鬥中受到傷害，只要您堅持不懈，就能恢復並繼續保衛您的部落。

坐騎與恐龍夥伴

隨著遊戲的進行，您將解鎖坐騎和恐龍夥伴。坐騎可以提高您的移動速度，讓您更靈活地躲避攻擊。恐龍夥伴與您並肩作戰，擁有強大的攻擊力和特殊技能，讓您更輕鬆地擊敗敵人。

這是一款輕鬆的迷你遊戲，非常適合在閒暇時享受。無論你是通勤，還是短暫休息，都能快速沉浸在戰鬥的樂趣中。拿起你的武器，加入保衛原始部落的戰鬥，成為部落的英雄！

tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

tw.description:
戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！
假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！


回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！

小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。

這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！

你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。

現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！

us.description:
Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History
· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024
· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of
· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies
· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse 

Official MLB & KBO Licenses
· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase
· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters

Create Your Perfect Team
· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world
· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users
· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available
· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team

New This Year
· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more
· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation
· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale
· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation
· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about
· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play.
· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go"
· And more!


OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. 

Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball.

Officially Licensed Product – MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE®

us.description:

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game “Clouds & Sheep”, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends’ needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals’ different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they’ll bring tiny lambs into the world!

Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock’s pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky.

Features:
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- Awesome sequel of the top game “Clouds & Sheep”
- Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth!
- Simulation game with adorable sheep
- Take care of your flock
- Raise sweet little lambs
- Actively play with your animals
- Give them many different items and objects
- Grow and harvest various resources
- Shear your sheep
- Customize their pasture
- Control the weather
- Day-night cycle
- Open-ended game set in a 3D world
- Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family
- MFi game controller support
- Game Center support

Thank you for playing ‘Clouds & Sheep 2’!

us.description:
Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 

Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 

Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg?

- Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!

- Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.

- The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them.

- Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.

- Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.

- Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.
Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

us.description:
Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy!

FEATURES
- PLAY WITHOUT ADS!
- City-building gameplay set in medieval times
- Cute inhabitants with their own daily routines
- Complex economy sim and deep production chains
- Dozens of different town and production buildings
- Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits
- Meaningful seasons and weather effects
- Devastating disasters like fire, disease, drought and many more
- Diverse scenarios and challenging tasks
- Unrestricted sandbox gameplay mode
- Game Center support

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. 
Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user.

• This application might scare you.
• All sensors are on one page.
• A real radar to track anomalies.
• Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector.
• Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off.

Warning:
If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately.

Disclaimer:
Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! 

Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered.

Play Your Way
· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. 
· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world.

Manage MLB History

Official MLB & KBO Licenses

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

tr.description:
Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 

Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 

Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg?

- Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!

- Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.

- The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them.

- Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.

- Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.

- Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.
Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy!

- Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits

tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

tr.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

+ Better Moon Age calculation.
